COMMON.contactText: If you have any questions, please contact us:
COMMON.introductionText: Welcome to our Terms of Use. Please read carefully.
COMMON.privacyText: Refer to our Privacy Policy for information on how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information.
COMMON.name: Name

TERMS_OF_USE.acceptanceText: By accessing or using the service, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use.
TERMS_OF_USE.modificationsText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of any significant changes.
TERMS_OF_USE.usageText: You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms.
TERMS_OF_USE.accountText: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.
TERMS_OF_USE.intellectualPropertyText: All content of the service is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
TERMS_OF_USE.liabilityText: We will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from the use of the service.
TERMS_OF_USE.terminationText: We may terminate or suspend your access to the service immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including violation of these terms.
TERMS_OF_USE.governingLawText: These terms will be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the country in which our company is registered.

PRIVACY_POLICY.introductionText: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide to us.
PRIVACY_POLICY.collectedInfoText: We collect information when you register on our site, make a purchase, or interact with us in other ways.
PRIVACY_POLICY.usageInfoText: The information we collect may be used in the following ways:
PRIVACY_POLICY.protectionInfoText: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information.

CONTACT.name: $COMMON.name
CONTACT.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 3 characters.
CONTACT.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters.

ABOUT.title: About Us
ABOUT.welcome: Welcome to our pet shop! We are dedicated to providing the best services and products for your pet.
ABOUT.goal: Our goal is to ensure the health and happiness of your pet.

HOME.heroTitle: Manage Your Pet Shop with Ease
HOME.heroText: Our software offers all the tools you need to run your business efficiently.
HOME.feature1Text: Make it easy for your customers to schedule services.
HOME.feature2Text: Control your finances simply and effectively.
HOME.feature3Text: Keep your inventory up to date and avoid shortages.
HOME.testimonial1Text: "PetFlow has revolutionized the management of my pet shop. Now I have more time to take care of my furry clients!"
HOME.testimonial2Text: "The interface is intuitive and the support is excellent. I recommend it to any pet shop business."
HOME.testimonial3Text: "With PetFlow, I was able to increase my efficiency and improve customer service."
HOME.registerText: Try PetFlow free for 30 days and transform the management of your pet shop.
